spells.name: Cat's Grace, Mass
spells.description: As cat's grace, affects one subject/level.

spells.name: Dispel Magic, Greater
spells.description: As dispel magic, but with multiple targets.

spells.name: Find the Path
spells.description: Shows most direct way to a location.

spells.name: Fire Seeds
spells.description: Acorns and berries become grenades and bombs.

spells.name: Ironwood
spells.description: Magic wood is as strong as steel.

spells.name: Spellstaff
spells.description: Stores one spell in wooden quarterstaff.

spells.name: Stone Tell
spells.description: Talk to natural or worked stone.

spells.name: Transport via Plants
spells.description: Move instantly from one plant to another of the same kind.

spells.name: Wall of Stone
spells.description: Creates a stone wall that can be shaped.
